resources.string: I\'m passionate about web, android, programming and tech generally. I also love and contribute to open source projects when I can. \n I work on personal projects such as Radaroid (android client for radar.techcabal.com), Peedgin (online dictionary for Pidgin english), WAEC (Unofficial API for WASSCE results), etc which I sometimes put on my Github. \n \t I am part of the KDE project where I contribute code/documentation to KDEConnect, a tool that helps sync media, uris, files, sms and notifications between Android phones and Linux desktop. I am also a volunteer Firefox advocate to help spread the Firefox gospel.
